revised_title: Isotopic Variations in Primitive Meteorites: Insights into the Solar System's Formation
tldr: This article discusses the isotopic variations found in primitive meteorites, providing insights into the birth of the Solar System. The study of these isotopic anomalies helps to understand nucleosynthesis and trace events during the Solar System's formation. Oxygen isotopes show the largest anomalies and are used to analyze the different groups of meteorites, revealing a complex history of mixing and fractionation processes.
